column4: wondering...there isn't a way for the server to only use SSLEnable on if the client browser is negotiating in SSL?
example: I have port 5000 for ssl, but i want it to also handle non-ssl. e.g. http://site:8000 and https://site:5000.
that's kind of offtopic for this channel, have you tried in #httpd?
ah, i'll hop over there. thx.
